title: Uzak Şehir
cast: Ozan Akbaba as Cihan Albora, Sinem Ünsal as Alya Smith Albora, Müfit Kayacan as Ecmel Albora, Ferit Kaya as Demir Baybars, Sinan Demirer as Muzaffer Sancak, Zeynep Kankonde / Banu Fotocan as Ümmü Sancak, Mehmet Polat as Hasan Karalı, Gonca Cilasun as Sadakat Albora, Kuzey Gezer as Deniz Cihan Albora, Alper Çankaya as Şahin Albora
story: Alya Albora, living in Canada, travels to Turkey with her son Deniz to honour her late husband’s final wish and return to his homeland—the Albora family’s lands in Mardin. But instead of a peaceful burial, she finds herself trapped in the clan’s power struggles. Cihan Albora, head of the family, may not stand idly by as she tries to leave with her child. Hidden secrets, a brutal past and a fight for survival force Alya into a life-or-death struggle in a place where there’s no exit.
